<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="2" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>2010</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="2" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>2009</B></FONT></TD>

<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><A NAME="toc109797_15"></A>ITEM&nbsp;9. CHANGES IN AND DISAGREEMENTS WITH ACCOUNTANTS ON ACCOUNTING AND FINANCIAL DISCLOSURE </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">None. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><A NAME="toc109797_16">
</A>ITEM&nbsp;9A. CONTROLS AND PROCEDURES </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Disclosure Controls and Procedures </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Company&#146;s management, with the participation of the Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer, has completed an
evaluation of the effectiveness of the design and operation of the Company&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e) of the Securities and Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#147;Exchange Act&#148;)).
Based on this evaluation, the Company&#146;s Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer have concluded that, as of August&nbsp;31, 2010, the Company&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures were effective to ensure that information
required to be disclosed by the Company in reports that it files or submits under the Exchange Act is recorded, processed, summarized and reported within the time periods specified by the Securities and Exchange Commission&#146;s rules and forms and
that such information is accumulated and communicated to management, including the Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer, as appropriate, to allow timely decisions regarding required disclosures. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:4px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Management&#146;s Annual Report on Internal Control Over Financial Reporting </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Management&#146;s Annual Report on Internal Control Over Financial Reporting is presented within Part II, Item&nbsp;8 of this report.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Changes in Internal Control Over Financial Reporting </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">There has been no change in the Company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting during its most recent fiscal quarter that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect,
the Company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer Certifications
</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The certifications of the Company&#146;s Chief Executive Office and Chief Financial Officer required under
Section&nbsp;302 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act have been filed with as Exhibits 31.1 and 31.2 to this report. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><A NAME="toc109797_17"></A>ITEM&nbsp;9B. OTHER INFORMATION </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">None. </FONT></P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Senior Vice President and Chief of Operations &#150; Capital and Interdivisional Programs</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Jeff P. Poeschl</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">45</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Vice President, Corporate Controller and Principal Accounting Officer</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:4px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Tamara L. Lundgren</U> joined us in September 2005 as Vice President and Chief Strategy Officer. She became Executive Vice President, Strategy and Investments in April 2006 and was elected Executive
Vice President and Chief Operating Officer in November 2006. In December 2008, Ms.&nbsp;Lundgren became the President and Chief Executive Officer. Prior to joining us, Ms.&nbsp;Lundgren was a Managing Director in the Investment Banking Division of
JPMorgan Chase, which she joined in 2001. From 1996 until 2001, Ms.&nbsp;Lundgren was a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank AG in New York and London. Prior to joining Deutsche Bank, Ms.&nbsp;Lundgren was a partner at the law firm of Hogan&nbsp;&amp;
Hartson, LLP in Washington, D.C. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Richard D. Peach</U> joined us in March 2007 and was appointed Chief Financial Officer in
December 2007. Mr.&nbsp;Peach was the Chief Financial Officer and Senior Vice President with the Western US energy utility, PacifiCorp, from 2003 to 2006. From 1995 to 2002 he served in a variety of senior management positions with ScottishPower,
the international energy company, including Group Controller, Managing Director of United Kingdom Customer Services and Director of Energy Supply Finance. Prior to joining ScottishPower, Mr.&nbsp;Peach was a senior manager with Coopers&nbsp;&amp;
Lybrand and is a member of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Scotland. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Gary A. Schnitzer</U> is Executive Vice
President and was in charge of our California metals recycling operations from 1980 until 2007. Mr.&nbsp;Schnitzer currently serves on our Executive Committee and assists in developing the strategic direction of our Metals Recycling Business and
Auto Parts Business. Mr.&nbsp;Schnitzer is a brother-in-law of Kenneth Novack and a first cousin of Jill Schnitzer Edelson and Jean S. Reynolds. Ms.&nbsp;Edelson,&nbsp;Mr.&nbsp;Novack and&nbsp;Ms.&nbsp;Reynolds are all&nbsp;directors of the Company
and members of the Schnitzer family. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Donald W. Hamaker</U> joined us as President of the Metals Recycling Business in
September 2005. Mr.&nbsp;Hamaker was employed in management positions by Hugo Neu Corporation for nearly 20 years, serving as President from 1999 to 2005. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Thomas D. Klauer, Jr.</U> has been the President of the Auto Parts Business since our acquisition of Pick-N-Pull Auto Dismantling, Inc. in 2003. Before that Mr.&nbsp;Klauer was employed by Pick-N-Pull,
having joined that Company in 1989. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Jeffrey Dyck</U> joined the Steel Manufacturing Business in February 1994 and served in
a variety of positions, including Manager of the Rolling Mills and Director of Operations of the Steel Manufacturing Business, before his promotion to President in June 2005. </FONT></P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Schnitzer Steel
Industries, Inc. Form 10-K 2010&nbsp;&nbsp;/&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>85</B> </FONT></P>

<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Richard C.
Josephson</U> joined us in January 2006 as Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary. Before that Mr.&nbsp;Josephson was a Member of the law firm Stoel Rives LLP, where he had practiced law since 1973. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:4px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>George P. Nutwell </U>joined us in October 2008 as Senior Vice President and Chief Administrative Officer and was appointed Chief of
Operations &#150; Capital and Interdivisional Programs in March 2010. Before joining us, Mr.&nbsp;Nutwell was employed from April 1970 until April 2007 in a number of senior management positions by Bechtel Corporation, most recently as the Corporate
Manager of Contracts and Procurement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Jeff P. Poeschl</U> joined us in February 2007 as Vice President and Corporate
Controller. He became our Principal Accounting Officer in December 2007. Mr.&nbsp;Poeschl was the Vice President &#150; Finance at Mesa Air Group, Inc., based in Phoenix, Arizona from 2000 to 2007. Prior to joining Mesa Air Group, Mr.&nbsp;Poeschl
was a senior manager with Deloitte&nbsp;&amp; Touche in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Mr.&nbsp;Poeschl is a member of the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants and the Wisconsin Institute of Certified Public Accountants. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:4px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Code of Ethics </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">On
April&nbsp;28, 2010, the Board of Directors approved a revised Company&#146;s Code of Conduct that is applicable to all of its directors and employees. It includes additional provisions that apply to the Company&#146;s principal executive officer,
principal financial officer, principal accounting officer or controller, and persons performing similar functions (the &#147;Senior Financial Officers&#148;). This document is posted on the Company&#146;s internet website (www.schnitzersteel.com)
and is available free of charge by calling the Company or submitting a request to ir@schn.com. The Company intends to disclose on its website any amendments to or waivers of the Code for directors, executive officers or Senior Financial Officers.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><A NAME="toc109797_20"></A>ITEM&nbsp;11. EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The information required by Items 402, 407(e)(4) and 407(e)(5) of Regulation S-K will be included under &#147;Compensation of Executive
Officers,&#148; &#147;Compensation Discussion and Analysis&#148;, &#147;Director Compensation&#148;, &#147;Corporate Governance &#150; Assessment of Compensation Risk&#148; and &#147;Compensation Committee Report&#148; in the Company&#146;s Proxy
Statement to be filed for its 2011 Annual Meeting of Shareholders and is incorporated herein by reference. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><A NAME="toc109797_21"></A>ITEM&nbsp;12. SECURITY OWNERSHIP OF CERTAIN BENEFICIAL OWNERS AND MANAGEMENT AND RELATED STOCKHOLDER MATTERS </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Information with respect to security ownership of certain beneficial owners and management, as required by Item&nbsp;403 of Regulation
S-K, will be included under &#147;Voting Securities and Principal Shareholders&#148; in the Company&#146;s Proxy Statement for its 2011 Annual Meeting of Shareholders and is incorporated herein by reference. Information with respect to securities
authorized for issuance under equity compensation plans, as required by Item&nbsp;201(d) of Regulation S-K, will be included under &#147;Compensation Plan Information&#148; in the Company&#146;s Proxy Statement for its 2011 Annual Meeting of
Shareholders and is incorporated herein by reference. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><A NAME="toc109797_22"></A>ITEM&nbsp;13. CERTAIN RELATIONSHIPS AND RELATED
TRANSACTIONS, AND DIRECTOR INDEPENDENCE </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The information required by Items 404 and 407(a) of Regulation S-K will be
included under &#147;Certain Transactions&#148; and &#147;Corporate Governance &#150; Director Independence&#148; in the Company&#146;s Proxy Statement for its 2011 Annual Meeting of Shareholders and is incorporated herein by reference. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><A NAME="toc109797_23"></A>ITEM&nbsp;14. PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTING FEES AND SERVICES </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Information regarding the Company&#146;s principal accountant fees and services required by Item&nbsp;9(e) of Schedule 14A will be
included under &#147;Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm&#148; in the Company&#146;s Proxy Statement for its 2011 Annual Meeting of Shareholders and is incorporated herein by reference. </FONT></P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>86</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;/&nbsp;&nbsp;Schnitzer Steel Industries, Inc. Form 10-K 2010 </FONT></P>

<DESCRIPTION>CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="font-size:1px;margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Exhibit 23.1 </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">We hereby consent to the incorporation by
reference in the Registration Statements on Form S-8 (Nos.33-87008, 333-21895, 333-100511, 333-160996) of Schnitzer Steel Industries, Inc. of our report dated October 20, 2010 relating to the financial statements, financial statement schedule and
the effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting, which appears in this Form 10-K. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Portland, Oregon </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">October&nbsp;20, 2010 </FONT></P>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-24.1
<SEQUENCE>4
<FILENAME>dex241.htm
<DESCRIPTION>POWERS OF ATTORNEY
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>POWERS OF ATTORNEY</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="font-size:1px;margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 24.1
</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">POWER OF ATTORNEY </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(Form 10-K) </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The undersigned hereby constitutes and appoints each
of Richard D. Peach and Jeff P. Poeschl his true and lawful attorney and agent, with full power of substitution and resubstitution, for him and in his name, place and stead, in any and all capacities, to sign the Annual Report on Form 10-K of
Schnitzer Steel Industries, Inc. for the year ended August&nbsp;31, 2010 and any and all amendments thereto, and to file the same, with all exhibits thereto, and other documents in connection therewith, with the Securities and Exchange Commission,
granting unto each attorney and agent full power and authority to do any and all acts and things necessary or advisable to be done, as fully and to all intents and purposes as he might or could do in person, hereby ratifying and confirming all that
the attorney and agent or his substitute or substitutes, may lawfully do or cause to be done by virtue hereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Dated:
October&nbsp;11, 2010 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="40%" BORDER="0">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="100%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px;border-bottom:1px solid #000000" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">/s/&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Robert S. Ball</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">ROBERT S. BALL</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="font-size:1px;margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">POWER OF ATTORNEY
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(Form 10-K) </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The undersigned hereby constitutes and appoints each of Richard D. Peach and Jeff P. Poeschl his true and lawful attorney and agent, with full power of substitution and resubstitution, for him and in his
name, place and stead, in any and all capacities, to sign the Annual Report on Form 10-K of Schnitzer Steel Industries, Inc. for the year ended August&nbsp;31, 2010 and any and all amendments thereto, and to file the same, with all exhibits thereto,
and other documents in connection therewith, with the Securities and Exchange Commission, granting unto each attorney and agent full power and authority to do any and all acts and things necessary or advisable to be done, as fully and to all intents
and purposes as he might or could do in person, hereby ratifying and confirming all that the attorney and agent or his substitute or substitutes, may lawfully do or cause to be done by virtue hereof. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Dated: October&nbsp;12, 2010 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="40%" BORDER="0">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="100%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px;border-bottom:1px solid #000000" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">/s/&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;William A. Furman</FONT></P></TD></TR>

<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="font-size:1px;margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">POWER OF ATTORNEY
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(Form 10-K) </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The undersigned hereby constitutes and appoints each of Richard D. Peach and Jeff P. Poeschl his true and lawful attorney and agent, with full power of substitution and resubstitution, for him and in his
name, place and stead, in any and all capacities, to sign the Annual Report on Form 10-K of Schnitzer Steel Industries, Inc. for the year ended August&nbsp;31, 2010 and any and all amendments thereto, and to file the same, with all exhibits thereto,
and other documents in connection therewith, with the Securities and Exchange Commission, granting unto each attorney and agent full power and authority to do any and all acts and things necessary or advisable to be done, as fully and to all intents
and purposes as he might or could do in person, hereby ratifying and confirming all that the attorney and agent or his substitute or substitutes, may lawfully do or cause to be done by virtue hereof. </FONT></P>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-31.1
<SEQUENCE>5
<FILENAME>dex311.htm
<DESCRIPTION>CERTIFICATION OF CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER PURSUANT TO SECTION 302
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>CERTIFICATION OF CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER PURSUANT TO SECTION 302</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="font-size:1px;margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Exhibit 31.1 </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO SECTION 302 OF </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">I, Tamara L. Lundgren, certify that: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">I have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of Schnitzer Steel Industries, Inc.; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in
light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
